dcterms:creator: H. Kuehne
A. Arslan
T. Serre
dcterms:description: A dataset containing videos of goal-directed human activities, specifically focusing on breakfast actions, with a total of 1.7k videos and 48 different actions.
dcterms:title: Breakfast Actions

dcterms:creator: S. Stein
S. J. McKenna
dcterms:description: A dataset that combines embedded accelerometers with computer vision to recognize food preparation activities, consisting of 50 videos with an average duration of 6.4 minutes each and 19 different actions.
dcterms:title: 50Salads

dcterms:creator: A. Fathi
X. Ren
J. M. Rehg
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for learning to recognize objects in egocentric activities, containing 28 videos with an average duration of 1.5 minutes each and 11 different actions.
dcterms:title: GTEA
